ValidationRule.description: Checks if the record type ID is "012G00000014QFb" and the status field is "Completed". If conditions are met, it checks if "Partner Satisfaction Score" or "Are you willing to provide a referral?" are null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = "012G00000014QFb", ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Completed"), OR( ISBLANK( Rate_Likelihood_of_Renewing_Year_2__c ), ISBLANK( TEXT(Are_you_willing_to_provide_a_referral__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Partner Satisfaction Score" and "Are you willing to provide a referral?" cannot be null before marking "Status" Completed.
